sentences.cn: 拐弯抹角地提及他的酗酒问题

sentences.cn: 他拐弯抹角地说她缺乏经验.

sentences.en: However , that might have been, the silence was not very prolonged. He took another oblique step.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 沉默的局面很快就被打破了.他转弯抹角地重新开始了.

sentences.en: It was an oblique reference to his mother.

sentences.cn: 需要对通过点O的任意斜截面绘制莫尔图.

sentences.en: Mr Golding delivered an oblique warning, talking of the danger of sudden action.
sentences.cn: 戈尔丁先生谈及草率行事的危险，这是他在委婉地发出警告。

sentences.en: Naturally, the expression for oblique incidence is more complicated.
sentences.cn: 倾斜入射的公式当然要更复杂些.

sentences.en: Pug had in some day , oblique or direct , wooed the girl.
sentences.cn: 帕格曾经以某种方式, 或明或暗地, 挑逗过这姑娘.

sentences.en: She gave an oblique look to one side.

sentences.cn: 她转弯抹角地提起她自身的事.

sentences.en: Sudden rupture and displacement occurs with normal, reverse, strike - slip, or oblique - slip faulting.
sentences.cn: 突然破裂和位移伴随正 、 逆 、 走向滑动或斜向滑动断层作用而发生.

sentences.en: The axis lies in any other direction the aspect is oblique.
sentences.cn: 该轴位于其它方向,则称为斜轴.

sentences.en: The oblique rays of the sun on the orchards create this typical landscape that traditional iconography would associate with an earthly paradise.
sentences.cn: 阳光撒在果园里形成了独特的景致,就像传统肖像画中描绘的天堂.
